webDev.title: Modern Frontend Development
webDev.description: SPA/SSR web applications using React, TypeScript, and Vue.js/Nuxt.js. Responsive design and performance optimization.

mobileDev.title: Automation Systems
mobileDev.description: Web automation systems using Python, Streamlit, and Flask. Process optimization and automation of repetitive tasks.

design.title: UI/UX Design & Implementation
design.description: User-friendly and beautiful interface design with frontend implementation. Optimizations and animations to enhance user experience.

backendDev.title: Test Automation & Quality Assurance
backendDev.description: Test automation with Playwright and Jest. Building CI/CD pipelines to ensure code quality and continuous deployment.
